title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson
description: A comprehensive textbook covering algorithms and data structures used in computer science.

title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
author: Erich Gamma, Richard Helm
description: Classic book on software design patterns in object-oriented programming.

title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Best practices for writing clean, maintainable code.

title: Fundamentals of Electric Circuits
author: Charles K. Sadiku, Matthew N.O. Alexander
description: Comprehensive introduction to electric circuit analysis and design.

title: Power System Analysis and Design
author: J. Duncan Glover, Thomas Overbye
description: Modern approach to power system analysis with computer applications.

title: Digital Signal Processing: Principles, Algorithms, and Applications
author: John G. Proakis, Dimitris G. Manolakis
description: Comprehensive coverage of digital signal processing theory and applications.

title: Communication Systems
author: Simon Haykin, Michael Moher
description: Modern treatment of communication systems with emphasis on digital communications.

title: Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach
author: Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles
description: Comprehensive introduction to thermodynamics with engineering applications.

title: Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design
author: Richard Budynas, Keith Nisbett
description: Machine design principles for mechanical engineering students and professionals.

title: Manufacturing Engineering and Technology
author: Serope Kalpakjian, Steven Schmid
description: Comprehensive coverage of manufacturing processes and systems.

title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow
author: Aurélien Géron
description: Practical guide to machine learning with Python frameworks.

title: Python for Data Analysis
author: Wes McKinney
description: Data wrangling with Pandas, NumPy, and IPython.

title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
author: Stuart Russell, Peter Norvig
description: Comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence theory and practice.

title: Calculus: Early Transcendentals
author: James Stewart
description: Comprehensive calculus textbook for engineering and science students.

title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers
author: Raymond A. Serway, John W. Jewett
description: Comprehensive physics textbook covering mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism.

title: Technical Communication: A Practical Approach
author: William Sanborn Pfeiffer, Kaye E. Adkins
description: Essential guide to technical writing for engineering and technology students.
